title: Hawaii to allow vaccinated mainland travelers to bypass pre-travel test, quarantine rules on July 8
content:
1. Hawaii to allow vaccinated mainland travelers to bypass pre-travel test, quarantine rules on July 8  KHON2 News
  2. Hawaii won't require COVID-19 test for vaccinated travelers starting July 8  Fox News
  3. Hawaii to soon allow vaccinated US travelers to skip quarantine and pre-flight testing  CNN
  4. Relaxing restrictions  West Hawaii Today
  5. State to loosen restrictions for mainland travelers, gatherings  KHON2 News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ハワイ州、ワクチン接種を受けた本土の旅行者が渡航前の検査や検疫の規則を回避できるようにすることを7月8日に決定
夏威夷将于7月8日允许已接种疫苗的大陆游客绕过旅行前测试和检疫规定
夏威夷將於7月8日允許已接種疫苗的大陸游客繞過旅行前測試和檢疫規定
